actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.
Committee on Post Office and Civil Service discharged.
Mr. Sawyer asked unanimous consent to discharge from committee and consider.
The title of the measure was amended. Agreed to without objection.
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Census and Population.
Received in the Senate, read twice.
Passed Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.
Message on Senate action sent to the House.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service
House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: To designate June 14, 1991, as "Baltic Freedom Day".

summary.text: Designates June 14, 1991 and 1992, as Baltic Freedom Day.

titles.title: To designate June 14, 1991, as "Baltic Freedom Day".
